edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.Constants
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware

Gives access to Constants and Resources for the Fedora Web Application. This class is loaded with the servlet context at startup time.

Author:
chet.rebman
See Also:
ServletContextAware
